item.description:
Two Ravens Kindred - Ostara Announcement

Join us as we celebrate Winter's end and Spring's return this Saturday, March 24. Gathering will be held at Mike's Hartford home. ***THIS IS AN RSVP REQUIRED EVENT! (please see p.s. below)**

Details as follows...

SCHEDULE
5:00pm - gather
6:00pm - discuss
7:00pm - blot
8:00pm - feast
9:30pm - sumbel?

We will consign "Old Man Winter" to the fireplace during the blot. Everyone will also have an opportunity to decorate craft eggs to keep or give to Ostara as a burnt offering. If you have any other small item for the flames, please feel free to bring it.

Directions and other info provided upon receipt of RSVP.

Wassail!
Mike
860-586-8890

p.s. No walk-ins permitted. No exceptions. Only individuals previously met (face-to-face) or those vouched for by a member of the community will be admitted.

* * *

Two Ravens Kindred:
http://www.tworavensk...

About Ostara:
http://en.wikipedia.o...
http://en.wikipedia.o...
